description.p: Specify if only one pane at a time can be open, or if multiple panes can be shown.

item.name: Single
item.description: Only one pane can be expanded at a time.

item.name: Multiple
item.description: Allow multiple tab panes to be expanded at the same time.

description.p: The Tab Control ID in the Form.

The *[ui:Initial open panes]* property defines the accordion panes that are shown when the Tab Control with a type of 'Accordion' is initially shown in the FormView. The first accordion pane is always pane '1'.

The open panes are specified as a comma delimited list of numbers. For example, specifying a value of *[ui:1,2]* indicates that both the first and second accordion pane should be open when initially rendered.
If the [Accordion style] is set to 'Single' enter a single value. If no panes should be open, leave this property blank.
